description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe has refused to give assurances to under-fire manager Erik ten Hag while insisting a decision on the Dutchman's future is out of his hands.
author: Rob Dawson

title: Martino: Miami deserves Club World Cup invite
description: Inter Miami coach Gerardo Martino confirmed FIFA has not selected the additional MLS participant for the 2025 Club World Cup yet, but insists the Herons now possess the "football fundamentals" to earn a spot in the tournament.
author: Lizzy Becherano

title: Paolo Maldini's son, Daniel, gets 1st Italy call-up
description: Daniel Maldini was called up by Italy coach Luciano Spalletti on Friday for Nations League matches and could follow in the footsteps of his father Paolo and grandfather Cesare, both former Italy captains.
author: Associated Press

title: Fenerbahce's Jose Mourinho: I was a 's--- player'
description: Fenerbahce coach Jose Mourinho gave a frank assessment of his playing career when asked about the performance of one of his defenders.
author: Adriana Garcia

title: Sources: Lauren Holiday in line for Courage role
description: Former World Cup champion Lauren Holiday is expected to play "a very active role" with the North Carolina Courage, should the sale of the team to Marc Lasry's Avenue Capital Group be finalized, sources told ESPN.
author: Jeff Kassouf

title: Meet the Penningtons: Raquel and Tecia take a title, partnership and parenthood to UFC 307
description: From managing motherhood to defending a title belt, their moment together in Salt Lake will be one-of-a-kind.
author: Andreas Hale

title: Naismith Hall of Fame to pay tribute to Spike Lee, Jack Nicholson and other superfans
description: The Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame will honor the group with a ceremony on Oct. 13.
author: Chris Herring

title: Oregon's 'Heroes' uniforms among the best college football threads in Week 6
description: Oregon's "Heroes" uniform began composition in 2022, when Dan Lanning was first hired.
author: Kalan Hooks

title: From Chelsea to Jimenez: Premier League surprise teams, players
description: The 2024-25 Premier League season is full of surprises. Did anyone think Chelsea would finally find a winning consistency? And how about Raul Jimenez's renaissance after fracturing his skull?
author: Ian Darke

title: Transfer Talk: Barcelona shop for Ansu Fati replacement
description: Barcelona are looking to send Ansu Fati out on loan again, but they need to find his replacement first. Transfer Talk has the latest.
author: Danny Lewis

title: Four draft trends you need to know about this season
description: After taking part in many fantasy basketball mock drafts, Steve Alexander provides his key takeaways.
author: Steve Alexander

title: Should you draft Jokic or Wembanyama at No. 1 this season?
description: With the incredible rise of Wemby, it's no longer a slam dunk to pick Nikola Jokic with the No. 1 pick.
author: ESPN Fantasy

title: Draft strategy: The best picks for each draft slot in Rounds 1 and 2
description: The top of your fantasy hockey draft is important, so we've mapped out how the top 20 picks should go.
author: Victoria Matiash
